title: [Talon Isle, Tidepools]
description: The stretch of idyllic beach shines like a second sun as the white sands bask in the day's radiance.  A plethora of thriving tidepools shelter in the curve of the vine-choked cliffside, reflected light sending rainbowed sparks scattering across the unforgiving black stone.  The scents of the sea and the isle's thriving flora commingle in a salty-sweet melange that perfumes the humid air.
